muxarchive.Archive items can be found and installed: Archiefitems kunnen hier worden gevonden en geïnstalleerd - savegames en -states, updates, thema's enz.

muxassign.This is where you can assign a core or e: Hier kun je een core of externe emulator toewijzen aan inhoud

muxcharge.Press POWER button to continue booting…: AAN-knop drukken, om verder op te starten…

muxconfig.Customise your muOS setup with user crea: Maak muOS uw eigen met aangepaste pakketten
muxconfig.Device specific and muOS frontend settin: Apparaat specifieke en muOS frontend instellingen kunnen hier worden gevonden
muxconfig.Settings to change the power features of: Settings to change the power features of the device
muxconfig.Settings to change the visual aspects of: Settings to change the visual aspects of the frontend

muxconnect.Connect to a Wi-Fi network manually or v: Connect to a Wi-Fi network manually or via a saved profile
muxconnect.Toggle a range of configurable services: Toggle a range of configurable services you can access via an active network
muxconnect.Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functiona: Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functionality
muxconnect.Toggle the visibility of the bluetooth g: Toggle the visibility of the bluetooth glyph

muxcustom.Allows for testing different theme resol: Allows for testing different theme resolutions
muxcustom.Change how the font type works in the fr: Change how the font type works in the frontend - 'Theme' will ensure frontend will use fonts within themes with a fallback to language fonts - 'Language' will specifically use language based font
muxcustom.Change the display priority of the conte: Change the display priority of the content images
muxcustom.Change the screen alignment of the conte: Change the screen alignment of the content images
muxcustom.Toggle the background animation of the c: Toggle the background animation of the current selected theme
muxcustom.Toggle the background music of the front: Toggle the background music of the frontend - This will stop if content is launched
muxcustom.Toggle the fade to black animation on co: Toggle the fade to black animation on content launching
muxcustom.Toggle the navigation sound of the front: Toggle the navigation sound of the frontend if the current theme supports it
muxcustom.Toggle the splash image on content launc: Toggle the splash image on content launching

muxgov.Configure CPU governors to dynamically a: CPU-governors configureren om de CPU-frequentie dynamisch aan te passen en energieverbruik en prestaties op elkaar af te stemmen

muxhdmi.Select the resolution for HDMI output, s: Resolutie voor HDMI-uitgave selecteren, bv. 720p of 1080p
muxhdmi.Set the color depth, such as 8-bit or 10: Kleurdiepte selecteren, bv. 8 bit of 10 bit
muxhdmi.Set the color space, such as RGB or YUV: Kleurenbereik instellen, bv. RGB of YUV
muxhdmi.Switch between device speaker or externa: Schakelen tussen audio van de ingebouwde speaker of externe audio via HDMI
muxhdmi.Switch between overscan or underscan to: Gebruik de over- of onderscan om de schermafmetingen aan te passen

muxinfo.Access statistics of played content and: Bekijk statistieken van afgespeelde inhoud en andere activiteiten
muxinfo.Test the controls of the device: De bediening van het apparaat testen
muxinfo.View all of the screenshots taken on the: View all of the screenshots taken on the device
muxinfo.View the current used space of the mount: View the current used space of the mounted storage devices

muxlaunch.Content added to collections can be foun: Aan collecties toegevoegde inhoud kan hier worden gestart
muxlaunch.Content on storage devices (SD1/SD2/USB): Inhoud op opslagapparaten (SD1/SD2/USB) kan hier worden gevonden en gestart
muxlaunch.Content previously launched can be found: Eerder gestarte inhoud kan hier gevonden en gelanceerd worden.
muxlaunch.Various applications can be found and la: Diverse toepassingen kunnen hier worden gevonden en gestart.
muxlaunch.Various configurations can be changed he: Various configurations can be changed here
muxlaunch.Various information can be found and lau: Various information can be found and launched here

muxnetprofile.Quickly switch between different Wi-Fi c: Quickly switch between different Wi-Fi configurations based on your location or network preferences

muxnetscan.Detect, display and connect to available: Detect, display and connect to available Wi-Fi networks

muxnetwork.Cannot modify while connected: Kan tijdens verbinding niet gewijzigd worden
muxnetwork.Connect to the network using options ent: Connect to the network using options entered above
muxnetwork.Enter the device IP address here (Static: Enter the device IP address here (Static only)
muxnetwork.Enter the device Subnet (CIDR) number he: Enter the device Subnet (CIDR) number here (Static only)
muxnetwork.Enter the network gateway address here (: Enter the network gateway address here (Static only)
muxnetwork.Toggle between DHCP and Static network t: Toggle between DHCP and Static network types
muxnetwork.Toggle whether or not to try and connect: Wel of niet proberen met een verborgen SSID te verbinden

muxoption.Name: Naam
muxoption.Search for content within the selected d: Inhoud in de geselecteerde map doorzoeken
muxoption.Set the CPU governor for the selected co: Set the CPU governor for the selected content or directory
muxoption.Set the system core or external emulator: Set the system core or external emulator for the selected content or directory

muxplore.Content is not associated with system or: Inhoud is niet met een systeem of core geassocieerd
muxplore.Could not load content: Fout bij het laden van inhoud
muxplore.Folders cannot be added to collections: Mappen kunnen niet aan collecties toegevoegd worden

muxpower.Configure how the power button functions: Configure how the power button functions on long press (2 seconds)
muxpower.Configure the time the device will sleep: Configure the time the device will sleep when no input is detected
muxpower.Configure the time the screen will dim w: Configure the time the screen will dim when no input is detected
muxpower.Configure when the red LED will display: Configure when the red LED will display based on the current capacity percentage

muxrtc.Change your current date, time, and time: Change your current date, time, and timezone

muxsearch.Enter in the name of the content you are: Geef de naam van de gezochte inhoud op
muxsearch.Lookup has to be 3 characters or more!: De zoekopdracht moet minstens 3 tekens lang zijn

muxsnapshot.Restore your saved game progress from a: Herstel uw spelvoortgang vanuit een eerdere snapshot

muxspace.View the current used space of the mount: View the current used space of the mounted storage devices

muxstorage.Location of assigned core and governor c: Locatie van toegewezen core en CPU-regulator configuraties
muxstorage.Location of friendly name configurations: Locatie van configuratie voor herkenbare naamgeving

muxsysinfo.The current CPU frequency of the device: The current CPU frequency of the device
muxsysinfo.The current detected temperature of the: The current detected temperature of the device
muxsysinfo.The current device type detected and con: The current device type detected and configured
muxsysinfo.The current running governor of the devi: The current running governor of the device
muxsysinfo.The current running time of the system: The current running time of the system
muxsysinfo.The current version of muOS running on t: The current version of muOS running on the device
muxsysinfo.The current, and total, memory usage of: The current, and total, memory usage of the device
muxsysinfo.The detected CPU type of the device: The detected CPU type of the device

muxtester.Press POWER to finish testing: Druk de AAN-knop om te stoppen met testen
muxtester.Press any button to start input testing!: Druk op een knop om de besturing te testen!

muxtweakadv.Adjust the rate of speed when holding na: Adjust the rate of speed when holding navigation keys down
muxtweakadv.Adjust the system swapfile if required b: Wijzig de grootte van de swapfile indien nodig voor sommige spellen
muxtweakadv.Adjust the system zram if required by ce: Adjust the system zram if required by certain content
muxtweakadv.Change how the device buttons work globa: Change how the device buttons work globally
muxtweakadv.Change the default audio level that the: Change the default audio level that the device will use each time it starts up
muxtweakadv.Change the default brightness level that: Change the default brightness level that the device will use each time it starts up
muxtweakadv.Change the default theme used for the ne: Change the default theme used for the next device launch
muxtweakadv.Change the displayed battery percentage: Change the displayed battery percentage to improve accuracy based on calibration or known deviations in the battery capacity reading
muxtweakadv.Switch between different storage tuning: Tussen verschillende algoritmen voor schrijfdoorvoer kiezen
muxtweakadv.Switch between system sleep suspend stat: Switch between system sleep suspend states
muxtweakadv.Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch unti: Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch until a network connection is established
muxtweakadv.Toggle startup and shutdown verbose mess: Toggle startup and shutdown verbose messages used for debugging faults
muxtweakadv.Toggle the functionality of the power bu: Gebruik de AAN-knop om de functie van het selectiepad te wisselen
muxtweakadv.Toggle the passcode lock - More informat: Toggle the passcode lock - More information can be found on the muOS website
muxtweakadv.Toggle the power LED during content laun: Toggle the power LED during content launch
muxtweakadv.Toggle the system ability to automatical: Toggle the system ability to automatically shut the device down due high temperature
muxtweakadv.Toggle vibration for device startup, sle: Toggle vibration for device startup, sleep, and shutdown

muxtweakgen.Change the brightness of the device to a: Change the brightness of the device to a specific level
muxtweakgen.Change the colour temperature of the dis: Change the colour temperature of the display if the device supports it
muxtweakgen.Change the volume of the device to a spe: Change the volume of the device to a specific level
muxtweakgen.Change where the device will start up in: Change where the device will start up into
muxtweakgen.Change your current date, time, and time: Change your current date, time, and timezone
muxtweakgen.Settings that should only be changed by: Settings that should only be changed by those who know what they are doing!
muxtweakgen.Settings to change the HDMI output of th: De HDMI-uitgave van het apparaat instellen

muxvisual.Changes the top title label in Explore C: Changes the top title label in Explore Content to show current storage device along with folder name
muxvisual.Changes the transparency of the overlay: Changes the transparency of the overlay image for the frontend only
muxvisual.Rearranges the label of content to move: Rearranges the label of content to move the 'The' label to the front - For example, 'Batman and Robin, The' to 'The Batman and Robin'
muxvisual.Remove extra information from content la: Remove extra information from content labels - This does NOT rename your files it only changes how it is displayed
muxvisual.Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) f: Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) for content labels
muxvisual.Replaces the label of shortened content: Replaces the label of shortened content folders to more appropriately named labels
muxvisual.Switch between different overlay styles: Switch between different overlay styles for the frontend only
muxvisual.Toggle hidden content displayed in Explo: Toggle hidden content displayed in Explore Content - Place a '.' or '_' character at the start of a file or folder name to hide it
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of currently selec: Toggle the visibility of currently selected file along with total in Explore Content
Toggle the visibility of currently selected folder along with total in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of empty folders i: Toon lege folders tijdens het doorzoeken van inhoud
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the battery gly: Toggle the visibility of the battery glyph
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the clock: Toggle the visibility of the clock
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the item count: Toggle the visibility of the item count within folders in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the network gly: Toggle the visibility of the network glyph

muxwebserv.Toggle Resilio - WebUI can be found on p: Toggle Resilio - WebUI can be found on port 6060
muxwebserv.Toggle SFTP support - WebUI can be found: Toggle SFTP support - WebUI can be found on port 9090
muxwebserv.Toggle SSH support - Access via port 22: Toggle SSH support - Access via port 22
muxwebserv.Toggle Syncthing - WebUI can be found on: Toggle Syncthing - WebUI can be found on port 7070
muxwebserv.Toggle Tailscale - Need to login via SSH: Tailscale inschakelen - Eerst via SSH inloggen om te configureren
muxwebserv.Toggle network time protocol for active: Toggle network time protocol for active network connections
muxwebserv.Toggle virtual terminal - WebUI can be f: Toggle virtual terminal - WebUI can be found on port 8080

system.Failed to close command stream: Fout bij het afsluiten van commando's
system.Failed to open EXTRA joystick device: Failed to open EXTRA joystick device

system.Failed to open file for writing: Fout bij openen van bestand voor schrijven
